description: The forest around Castle Creepenstein is dark and scary! Let's help Dash use the eye lights to find our way out of here.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically turn the lights off then automatically turn off all eye lights.
puzzles.introduction: Yikes!  When Dash's eye lights turn off, this forest is really dark!

puzzles.description: After turning off the eye lights, make Dash automatically say "Oh no!". Then make Dash instantly start spinning with the left wheel set to -20 cm/s and the right wheel set to 20 cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: I think this dark forest has Dash going in circles.

hints.description: Link the eye ring to the sound with an Auto cue. Add a Moving Basics state and set the left wheel to -20 cm/s and the right wheel to 20 cm/s. Link the Moving Basics state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After spinning, make Dash turn on all eye lights when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: I think it's time to shed a little light on this situation!

hints.description: Drag out a new Eye Ring and turn on all of the eye lights. Link the new eye ring with a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on the eye lights, make Dash instantly move forward with both wheels set to 20 cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: Now we can see where we're going!

hints.description: Drag out a new Moving Basics state and set both wheels to 20 cm/s. Link the new Moving Basics state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After moving forward, make Dash turn the lights off again when the top button is released.
puzzles.introduction: Whoops!  If you let go of the button, the lights will go out again!

hints.description: Link the states with a Top Button Released cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DASH: Help Dash escape from Castle Creepenstein! Press the top button to make Dash move forward three times.
puzzles.introduction: Time to find our way out of this dark forest!
